title: New: Openwater – Walk Away
content: Chicago’s flourishing underground scene has spoilt us with their R&B offerings in the past few years, with the likes of  THE-DRUM and Supreme Cuts proving particular highlights; well now we can add one more name to the ever growing list: the promising act  Openwater. With Brandon Marx’s debut track he dives head first into a sea of late night electrified R&B ambiance and grows into an emotional pop freakout that places him amidst the ones to watch for the rest of 2014.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d44
